speaker: PANDER
text: Bolt!

speaker: BOLT
text: Sir?

speaker: PANDER
text: Search the market narrowly. Mytilene is full

speaker: PANDER
text: of gallants. We lost too much money this mart by

speaker: PANDER
text: being too wenchless.

speaker: BAWD
text: We were never so much out of creatures. We

speaker: BAWD
text: have but poor three, and they can do no more than

speaker: BAWD
text: they can do; and they with continual action are

speaker: BAWD
text: even as good as rotten.

speaker: PANDER
text: Therefore let’s have fresh ones, whate’er we

speaker: PANDER
text: pay for them. If there be not a conscience to be

speaker: PANDER
text: used in every trade, we shall never prosper.

speaker: BAWD
text: Thou sayst true. ’Tis not our bringing up of poor

speaker: BAWD
text: bastards—as I think I have brought up some

speaker: BAWD
text: eleven—

speaker: BOLT
text: Ay, to eleven, and brought them down again. But

speaker: BOLT
text: shall I search the market?

speaker: BAWD
text: What else, man? The stuff we have, a strong

speaker: BAWD
text: wind will blow it to pieces, they are so pitifully

speaker: BAWD
text: sodden.

speaker: PANDER
text: Thou sayst true. There’s two unwholesome, a’

speaker: PANDER
text: conscience. The poor Transylvanian is dead that

speaker: PANDER
text: lay with the little baggage.

speaker: BOLT
text: Ay, she quickly pooped him. She made him

speaker: BOLT
text: roast-meat for worms. But I’ll go search the

speaker: BOLT
text: market.

speaker: PANDER
text: Three or four thousand chequins were as

speaker: PANDER
text: pretty a proportion to live quietly, and so give over.

speaker: BAWD
text: Why to give over, I pray you? Is it a shame to get

speaker: BAWD
text: when we are old?

speaker: PANDER
text: O, our credit comes not in like the commodity,

speaker: PANDER
text: nor the commodity wages not with the danger.

speaker: PANDER
text: Therefore, if in our youths we could pick up some

speaker: PANDER
text: pretty estate, ’twere not amiss to keep our door

speaker: PANDER
text: hatched. Besides, the sore terms we stand upon

speaker: PANDER
text: with the gods will be strong with us for giving o’er.

speaker: BAWD
text: Come, other sorts offend as well as we.

speaker: PANDER
text: As well as we? Ay, and better too; we offend

speaker: PANDER
text: worse. Neither is our profession any trade; it’s no

speaker: PANDER
text: calling. But here comes Bolt.

speaker: BOLT
text: Come your ways, my masters. You say she’s a

speaker: BOLT
text: virgin?

speaker: PIRATE
text: O, sir, we doubt it not.

speaker: BOLT
text: Master, I have gone through for this piece you

speaker: BOLT
text: see. If you like her, so; if not, I have lost my

speaker: BOLT
text: earnest.

speaker: BAWD
text: Bolt, has she any qualities?

speaker: BOLT
text: She has a good face, speaks well, and has excellent

speaker: BOLT
text: good clothes. There’s no farther necessity of

speaker: BOLT
text: qualities can make her be refused.

speaker: BAWD
text: What’s her price, Bolt?

speaker: BOLT
text: I cannot be bated one doit of a thousand pieces.

speaker: PANDER
text: Well, follow me, my masters; you shall have

speaker: PANDER
text: your money presently.—Wife, take her in. Instruct

speaker: PANDER
text: her what she has to do, that she may not be raw in

speaker: PANDER
text: her entertainment.

speaker: BAWD
text: Bolt, take you the marks of her: the color of her

speaker: BAWD
text: hair, complexion, height, her age, with warrant of

speaker: BAWD
text: her virginity, and cry “He that will give most shall

speaker: BAWD
text: have her first.” Such a maidenhead were no cheap

speaker: BAWD
text: thing, if men were as they have been. Get this done

speaker: BAWD
text: as I command you.

speaker: BOLT
text: Performance shall follow.

speaker: MARINA
text:
Alack
               
              that
               
              Leonine
               
              was
               
              so
               
              slack
              ,
               
              so
               
              slow
              !

speaker: MARINA
text:
He
               
              should
               
              have
               
              struck
              ,
               
              not
               
              spoke
              .
               
              Or
               
              that
               
              these
               
              pirates
              ,

speaker: MARINA
text:
Not
               
              enough
               
              barbarous
              ,
               
              had
               
              but
               
              o’erboard
               
              thrown
               
              me

speaker: MARINA
text:
For
               
              to
               
              seek
               
              my
               
              mother
              .

speaker: BAWD
text: Why lament you, pretty one?

speaker: MARINA
text: That I am pretty.

speaker: BAWD
text: Come, the gods have done their part in you.

speaker: MARINA
text: I accuse them not.

speaker: BAWD
text: You are light into my hands, where you are like

speaker: BAWD
text: to live.

speaker: MARINA
text: The more my fault, to ’scape his hands where

speaker: MARINA
text: I was to die.

speaker: BAWD
text: Ay, and you shall live in pleasure.

speaker: MARINA
text: No.

speaker: BAWD
text: Yes, indeed shall you, and taste gentlemen of all

speaker: BAWD
text: fashions. You shall fare well; you shall have the

speaker: BAWD
text: difference of all complexions. What, do you stop

speaker: BAWD
text: your ears?

speaker: MARINA
text: Are you a woman?

speaker: BAWD
text: What would you have me be, an I be not a

speaker: BAWD
text: woman?

speaker: MARINA
text: An honest woman, or not a woman.

speaker: BAWD
text: Marry, whip the gosling! I think I shall have

speaker: BAWD
text: something to do with you. Come, you’re a young

speaker: BAWD
text: foolish sapling, and must be bowed as I would

speaker: BAWD
text: have you.

speaker: MARINA
text: The gods defend me!

speaker: BAWD
text: If it please the gods to defend you by men, then

speaker: BAWD
text: men must comfort you, men must feed you, men

speaker: BAWD
text: stir you up. Bolt’s returned.

speaker: BAWD
text: Now, sir, hast thou cried her through the market?

speaker: BOLT
text: I have cried her almost to the number of her

speaker: BOLT
text: hairs. I have drawn her picture with my voice.

speaker: BAWD
text: And I prithee tell me, how dost thou find the inclination

speaker: BAWD
text: of the people, especially of the younger

speaker: BAWD
text: sort?

speaker: BOLT
text: Faith, they listened to me as they would have

speaker: BOLT
text: hearkened to their father’s testament. There was a

speaker: BOLT
text: Spaniard’s mouth watered an he went to bed to her

speaker: BOLT
text: very description.

speaker: BAWD
text: We shall have him here tomorrow with his best

speaker: BAWD
text: ruff on.

speaker: BOLT
text: Tonight, tonight! But, mistress, do you know the

speaker: BOLT
text: French knight that cowers i’ the hams?

speaker: BAWD
text: Who? Monsieur Verolles?

speaker: BOLT
text: Ay, he. He offered to cut a caper at the proclamation,

speaker: BOLT
text: but he made a groan at it and swore he would

speaker: BOLT
text: see her tomorrow.

speaker: BAWD
text: Well, well, as for him, he brought his disease

speaker: BAWD
text: hither; here he does but repair it. I know he will

speaker: BAWD
text: come in our shadow, to scatter his crowns in the

speaker: BAWD
text: sun.

speaker: BOLT
text: Well, if we had of every nation a traveler, we

speaker: BOLT
text: should lodge them with this sign.

speaker: BAWD
text: Pray you, come hither awhile. You

speaker: BAWD
text: have fortunes coming upon you. Mark me: you

speaker: BAWD
text: must seem to do that fearfully which you commit

speaker: BAWD
text: willingly, despise profit where you have most gain.

speaker: BAWD
text: To weep that you live as you do makes pity in your

speaker: BAWD
text: lovers. Seldom but that pity begets you a good

speaker: BAWD
text: opinion, and that opinion a mere profit.

speaker: MARINA
text: I understand you not.

speaker: BOLT
text: O, take her home, mistress, take her home!

speaker: BOLT
text: These blushes of hers must be quenched with

speaker: BOLT
text: some present practice.

speaker: BAWD
text: Thou sayst true, i’ faith, so they must, for your

speaker: BAWD
text: bride goes to that with shame which is her way to

speaker: BAWD
text: go with warrant.

speaker: BOLT
text: Faith, some do and some do not. But, mistress,

speaker: BOLT
text: if I have bargained for the joint—

speaker: BAWD
text: Thou mayst cut a morsel off the spit.

speaker: BOLT
text: I may so.

speaker: BAWD
text: Who should deny it? Come, young one, I like

speaker: BAWD
text: the manner of your garments well.

speaker: BOLT
text: Ay, by my faith, they shall not be changed yet.

speaker: BAWD
text: Bolt, spend thou that in the town.

speaker: BAWD
text: Report what a sojourner we have. You’ll

speaker: BAWD
text: lose nothing by custom. When Nature framed this

speaker: BAWD
text: piece, she meant thee a good turn. Therefore say

speaker: BAWD
text: what a paragon she is, and thou hast the harvest

speaker: BAWD
text: out of thine own report.

speaker: BOLT
text: I warrant you, mistress, thunder shall not so

speaker: BOLT
text: awake the beds of eels as my giving out her beauty

speaker: BOLT
text: stirs up the lewdly inclined. I’ll bring home some

speaker: BOLT
text: tonight.

speaker: BAWD
text: Come your ways. Follow me.

speaker: MARINA
text:
If
               
              fires
               
              be
               
              hot
              ,
               
              knives
               
              sharp
              ,
               
              or
               
              waters
               
              deep
              ,

speaker: MARINA
text:
Untied
               
              I
               
              still
               
              my
               
              virgin
               
              knot
               
              will
               
              keep
              .

speaker: MARINA
text:
Diana
               
              aid
               
              my
               
              purpose
              !

speaker: BAWD
text: What have we to do with Diana, pray you? Will

speaker: BAWD
text: you go with us?
